text: Just refactored our app to use separate RTK Query slices for each API. The codebase is so much cleaner now! #React #Redux #CleanCode
The performance improvements with Server Components are incredible. It's a game changer for building fast, dynamic web applications.
Loving the consistency and ease of use with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Building beautiful, responsive UIs has never been faster. #UI #UX
